Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan and India have played eight T20Is, with India winning six.
India topped Group A with three wins and one no result, while Afghanistan finished second in Group C.
The pitch at Kensington Oval has an average first innings score of 154, providing assistance to both batsmen and bowlers.
Afghanistan's key players include Rashid Khan, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, and Gulbadin Naib.
India's top performers are Rohit Sharma, Suryakumar Yadav, and Jasprit Bumrah.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the first of the Super 8 stage in the T20 World Cup 2024.
This is the teams' first meeting in the Super 8 stage.
Others: Live ball-by-ball commentary available on the SportsTiger app.
